summary: An ordinance approving amended assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1886, for the improvement of Lakeside Avenue from the north line of Yesler Way produced East, to James Street; Erie Avenue from East Alder Street to East Jefferson Street; Randolph Avenue from East Alder Street to East James Street; East Terrace Street, from Lakeside Avenue to the west line of Yesler's 3rd Addition to the City of Seattle; East Jefferson Street from Lakeside Avenue to Randolph Avenue; Wellington Avenue, from East James Street to Randolph Avenue; and East James Street from Wellington Avenue to Lakeside Avenue; all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks, stairways and grading, under Ordinance No. 19554 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
